message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm offering it to you for $100. I'm confident you'll be happy with this deal. It's a one-time offer, and I'm willing to provide a 100% satisfaction guarantee. If you buy this product, I'll even throw in a free inspection report to verify its quality. Don't miss out on this opportunity to get a $400 product for just $100!
I'm not buying, I'll wait for the next product.

It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm willing to let go of for a very low price. Think of it as a 'lottery ticket' - it might not be the best product, but it could be a great investment if you're feeling lucky. Plus, the price is unbeatable at $100. What do you say?
